department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Service and Repair for various types of TYMetal Motorized Rolling Gates and Commercial Chain link Security fences
description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by 2023-06-02 at 14:00 EDT. All bids submitted after 14:00 EDT will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. Canada is seeking offers from Offerors to provide Service and Repair for various types of TYMetal Motorized Rolling Gates and Commercial Chain link Security fences, to include all supervision, labour, materials, tools, transportation and equipment, on an as and when required basis, at Stony Mountain Institution to Correctional Service Canada. The Standing offer will be in effect from date of issuance for three years.
full_summary:
# Tender Notice
**Title / Titre**: 21537-231192 - Sally Port Security Gates Maintenance and Repair - Stony Mountain RFSO

**Reference Number / Numéro de référence**: WS3951126864-Doc3966150915

## Tender Information
* **Solicitation Number / Numéro de sollicitation**: WS3951126864
* **Publication Date / Date de publication**: 2023-05-05
* **Tender Closing Date / Date limite de soumission**: 2023-06-02T14:00:00
* **Amendment Date / Date de modification**: 2023-05-05

## Procurement Details
* **Procurement Method / Méthode de traite**: Competitive - Open bidding
* **Notice Type / Type de notice**: Request for Standing Offer
* **Selection Criteria / Criteres selection**: Lowest Price

## Goods and Services
* **Trade Agreements / Accords commerciaux**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* **Financial Services and Solution**: Offerors must provide service and repair for various types of TYMetal Motorized Rolling Gates and Commercial Chain link Security fences
* **Expected Contract Start / Date de début du contrat**: 2023-06-30
* **Expected Contract End / Date de fin du contrat**: 2026-06-30

## Contact Information
* **Contact Name / Nom du contact**: Keenan, Matthew (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Contact Email / Courriel du contact**: matthew.keenan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Notice URL / URL de la notice**: <http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16188136?extsite=MTYxODgxMzZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>

## Organization Information
* **Contracting Entity Name / Nom de l'entité contractante**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contracting Entity Address / Adresse de l'entité contractante**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada
